channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-28766] UnalignedCheckpointStressITCase.runStressTest failed with NoSuchFileException

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: pnowojski Any idea who could help out with this test instability?
martijnvisser, I will take a look
akalashnikov any updates on that issue. FYI: We're seeing other tests failing with a similar issue where temporary files are not present anymore (e.g. FLINK-28898)

I created the missing 1.16 backport PR. May one of you approve that PR, akalashnikov/pnowojski? Or was there a reason why you didn't proceed with the backport? We observed the test failure in both master and release-1.16.
mapohl , thanks for creating the backport. There are no reasons to have it. I just missed this part. I've approved your PR.

Cool, thanks for approving the PR. Here's the summary of the ticket resolution:

master:

  • 1ddaa2a460dd8def96742d0d94b1a86df4ae9c81
  • 9e1cefe250972b213ac69322531a4de69ca0e1a6

1.16:

  • 98647fba9a0c04151135a2bbfe611bba9956aea6
  • 56273f307c6e5e1d25d712a931ffc352d0c9021e
